author: Anntonette Jackson
text:
This little piece of mine is a snippet from a poem called "The Rose Garden" within my third #Poetry book "Trees & Truths" (pg.17-18). I always wanted to plant my very own garden someday.
 
🌷🌹🌻👩🏾‍🌾

author: Anntonette Jackson
text:
Check out Sonja's #Writing! A fellow #Nature #Poet who knows how to grasp any topic on the beauty of Nature with her unique style in #Poetry , whether it's of trees and/or a whole forest!

read it.

author: Anntonette Jackson
text:
Seasons change with hues
of winter, spring, summer, fall
trees paint off dead leaves.

• Here is an old #Oilpastel #Drawing I painted 🎨 with some leaves, a tree and the four seasons. Decided to write an #Haiku with my #Painting .

❄️🌱☀️🍁
🍂🌳

 #Poetree #Poetry #Art https://t.co/6o3FFZl9LQ

author: Anntonette Jackson
text:
Where would I grow,
if my heart melts with the snow?
Will my soul bloom
with a sense of sunlight,
shining down in my soil?
Or will my soul gloom
with a wave of flood-like waters,
drowning in my flowerbed?

🌼🌿🌸🥀🌺⚘️❄️

#Poetry #Poetrycommunity #Writingcommunity #Spring https://t.co/ccUzalxl7A

author: Anntonette Jackson
text:
• The Rosebud that always promises new life between the ones who are ready at the end of their lifetime, they can know when their legacy will live on. A single rose and yet we know, in our hearts it will blossom, wither and die.
#Poem written & recited by me🌹🙌🏾
#Poetry #Nature https://t.co/6u9NQ5BRyx

author: Anntonette Jackson
text:
Hi #Writersoftwitter , my name is Anntonette Jackson and I am a Canadian Author in #Poetry. I currently write #Nature #POEMS ! I've published 3 #books so far on Amazon. I use a heavy amount of Imagery and Personification in my #Writing .
#WritingCommunity #Poetrycommunity  🙌🏾🌿❤️ https://t.co/6RXIQW8w52
